mapper.select: select r.name from sys_role r inner join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id where r.status = 1 and ur.user_id = #{userId}

select m.name from sys_role r inner join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id inner join sys_role_menu rm on r.id = rm.role_id inner join sys_menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id where r.status = 1 and m.status = 1 and ur.user_id = #{userId}
